title: Math-Based Problem-Solving Project Utilizing Systems Thinking and Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts (functions, graphs, equations) and experiential understanding of workplace problems
context.additional_context: Learners, as professionals in healthcare/legal/technical fields, focus on modeling and resolving complex work problems from a systems perspective, utilizing collaboration tools and modeling software via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can decompose complex problems occurring in real work environments into system elements and create causal loop diagrams.
Learners can build mathematical models using tools such as Stella and Vensim to perform problem-solving simulations and interpret results.
Learners can identify leverage points (key variables) within a system and propose actionable improvement strategies through project deliverables.

resources: Free Trial Version of System Dynamics Modeling Software License

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
